description: Describes an endpoint authorization for authorizing Redshift-managed VPC endpoint access to a cluster across AWS accounts.

AwsAccount.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^\d{12}$  
Update requires: No interruption

VpcId.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^vpc-[A-Za-z0-9]{1,17}$  
Update requires: No interruption

ClusterIdentifier.markdownDescription:
The cluster identifier.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^(?=^[a-z][a-z0-9]*(-[a-z0-9]+)*$).{1,63}$  
Update requires: Replacement

Account.description: The target AWS account ID to grant or revoke access for.
Account.markdownDescription:
The target AWS account ID to grant or revoke access for.

---

Required: Yes  
Type:   
Update requires: Replacement

VpcIds.description: The virtual private cloud (VPC) identifiers to grant or revoke access to.
VpcIds.markdownDescription:
The virtual private cloud (VPC) identifiers to grant or revoke access to.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Force.description: Indicates whether to force the revoke action. If true, the Redshift-managed VPC endpoints associated with the endpoint authorization are also deleted.
Force.markdownDescription:
Indicates whether to force the revoke action. If true, the Redshift-managed VPC endpoints associated with the endpoint authorization are also deleted.

---

Required: No  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

Grantor.description: The AWS account ID of the cluster owner.
Grantor.markdownDescription:
The AWS account ID of the cluster owner.

---

Required: No  
Type:   
Update requires: No interruption

Grantee.description: The AWS account ID of the grantee of the cluster.
Grantee.markdownDescription:
The AWS account ID of the grantee of the cluster.

---

Required: No  
Type:   
Update requires: No interruption

AuthorizeTime.description: The time (UTC) when the authorization was created.
AuthorizeTime.markdownDescription:
The time (UTC) when the authorization was created.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

ClusterStatus.markdownDescription:
The status of the cluster.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Status.description: The status of the authorization action.
Status.markdownDescription:
The status of the authorization action.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

AllowedAllVPCs.description: Indicates whether all VPCs in the grantee account are allowed access to the cluster.
AllowedAllVPCs.markdownDescription:
Indicates whether all VPCs in the grantee account are allowed access to the cluster.

---

Required: No  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

AllowedVPCs.description: The VPCs allowed access to the cluster.
AllowedVPCs.markdownDescription:
The VPCs allowed access to the cluster.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

EndpointCount.description: The number of Redshift-managed VPC endpoints created for the authorization.
EndpointCount.markdownDescription:
The number of Redshift-managed VPC endpoints created for the authorization.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption
